column5: Hi all,  After some pretty terrible weather conditions over the last couple of weeks i finally kept my promise to Jack to take him to his favourite lake...he loves this lake...its actually the one where he caught his first fish last year.   Not much to say other than what a nice way to end a day for everyone...especially since mum was at work, Jack had to be at the sitters while i was being prodded with sharp needles in the shoulder, just nice to all meet up and relax outside.          FAMILY OUTINGS ARE JUST WHAT THE DOCTOR ORDERED  <iframe width="560" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/RHC25sdHDWA" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>                       MY FAVOURITE PEOPLE IN THE WORLD      HE HAS HAD HIS STICK FOR OVER A MONTH NOW AND ALWAYS BRINGS IT TO 'PADDLE' WHEN WE GET OUT IN THE BOAT       LOL.....BY THE LOOKS ON THE FACES IT WAS A STRESSFUL,LONG DAY       FISHING IS SERIOUS AND THIRSTY WORK!          THE MOOD LIGHTENED AS THE SKY GREW DARK                       Another wonderful evening on the lake,
Happy Fathers Day Simone! You and Jack have many many years of fishing together, enjoy.
A great way to spend a day with your love one's! Happy Fathers Capt Simon!..
